title: The Principle Youth March

tokens.lyric: We are the youth, soldiers of the truth, called by our

lines.raw: [D]We are the youth, soldiers of the truth, called by our [G]God on [D]high;

tokens.lyric: Now is the time, march to the

lines.raw: [Bm]Now is the time, march to the [A7]world, sounding the battle [D]cry!

tokens.lyric: Too long the dark night of sin held in
fear the people of the world,

lines.raw: [Bm]Too long the dark night of sin held in [F#7]fear the people of the world,
[Bm]We'll drive the darkness [F#7]away, [Bm]bringing in the new [F#7]day.
[D]Lift high! Lift [Em]high! The banner of [D]Truth on [G]high;

tokens.lyric: sea, to the ends of the

lines.raw: [D]March forward crossing the [A7]sea, to the ends of the [D]earth.

tokens.lyric: Heaven and earth all are made anew, blessed by the light of God;

lines.raw: [D]Heaven and earth all are made anew, blessed by the light of God;

tokens.lyric: Evil and sin vanish away, burned in the holy fire.

lines.raw: [D]Evil and sin vanish away, burned in the holy fire.

tokens.lyric: This is the land of the heart, every people living as one,

lines.raw: [D]This is the land of the heart, every people living as one,

tokens.lyric: Glad voices filling the land, sing a joyful song.

lines.raw: [D]Glad voices filling the land, sing a joyful song.

tokens.lyric: Proud is my heart bursting with my hope, we are the youth of God;

lines.raw: [D]Proud is my heart bursting with my hope, we are the youth of God;

tokens.lyric: See how we go moving as one, marching at His command.

lines.raw: [D]See how we go moving as one, marching at His command.

tokens.lyric: Five colors shine in the ranks, every people, every race of man.

lines.raw: [D]Five colors shine in the ranks, every people, every race of man.

tokens.lyric: We'll shake the heavens and earth, with our victory song.

lines.raw: [D]We'll shake the heavens and earth, with our victory song.
